title: Parental Controls: Dashboard Widget Restrictions (com.apple.dashboard)
description: The payload that configures allowed dashboard widgets.

whiteListEnabled.title: Enable dashboard widget allowlist
whiteListEnabled.description: If 'true', enables the widget allow list.

Type.title: Entry Type
Type.description: The type of allow list item. Set to 'bundleID' to use a widget's bundle ID as its main ID.

ID.title: Bundle ID
ID.description: The bundle ID of a widget.

WhiteList.title: Dashboard widget allowlist
WhiteList.description: An array of widget item dictionaries that are allowed.
